article.title: Local Events - Virginia and Washington, D.C. U.S. Export Assistance Centers
article.summary: Learn more about events presented by the Virginia and Washington, D.C. U.S. Export Assistance Centers.
article.content:
​

The U.S. Commercial Service organizes and supports conferences, seminars, and events to educate our clients and promote international trade. Our goal is to help local U.S. exporters sell globally.

Events

Global Cross-Cultural Competence in International Business

Washington, DC -- September 23, 2014​

U.S.-AfricaInfrastructureConference

Washington, DC – October 7-9, 2014

After-Hours Networking Series

Bi-monthly After-Hours Networking Series: Come join us for lively, informal exchanges of information. Private and public sector authorities on the relevant topics will be on hand to share their knowledge. This is a great opportunity to network with other Virginia and Washington, D.C. exporters and U.S. Government officials.​
